enhanced_by.reason: The create method requires a long option to be set, which is done by withLongOpt.
The create method uses the description set by withDescription.
The create method uses the argument count set by hasArg.
The create method uses the required flag set by isRequired.
The create method uses the type set by withType.
The create method uses the value separator set by withValueSeparator.
The create method resets the state after creating the Option, ensuring the builder is ready for the next use.
